mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_channel_ext where exists(select * from ujcms_channel t where t.id_ = ujcms_channel_ext.id_ and t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ujcms_channel_ext set seo_title_ = #{seoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_keywords_ = #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_description_ = #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_template_ = #{articleTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_template_ = #{channelTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_size_ = #{pageSize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, image_ = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_url_ = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_blank_ = #{targetBlank,jdbcType=CHAR}, allow_comment_ = #{allowComment,jdbcType=CHAR}, allow_contribute_ = #{allowContribute,jdbcType=CHAR}, allow_search_ = #{allowSearch,jdbcType=CHAR}, static_file_ = #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_static_file_ = #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_ = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_ = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, text_ = #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_channel_ext (id_, seo_title_, seo_keywords_, seo_description_, article_template_, channel_template_, page_size_, image_, link_url_, target_blank_, allow_comment_, allow_contribute_, allow_search_, static_file_, mobile_static_file_, created_, modified_, text_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetBlank,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{allowComment,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{allowContribute,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{allowSearch,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.seo_title_, t.seo_keywords_, t.seo_description_, t.article_template_, t.channel_template_, t.page_size_, t.image_, t.link_url_, t.target_blank_, t.allow_comment_, t.allow_contribute_, t.allow_search_, t.static_file_, t.mobile_static_file_, t.created_, t.modified_, t.text_
